files.description: Package initializer exporting the public API for generating compliance/certification pathway artifacts.
Defines dataclasses and schemas for standards, components, tests, documentation checklist items, and certification strategy decision nodes.
Contains curated v1 mappings for FMVSS/UNECE standards, required tests, documentation package checklist, and component-to-standard crosswalk data.
Renders the compliance standards map, structured mapping table, checklist, and decision tree into a single markdown artifact.
Implements the end-to-end generator that assembles data, validates it, and writes /outputs/compliance_standards_map.md deterministically.
Provides a CLI entry point to generate the v1 compliance/certification pathway artifact into outputs with optional flags for region focus and formatting.
Standalone script to run the generator and produce outputs/compliance_standards_map.md in one command for CI or local use.
Generated v1 compliance/certification pathway markdown artifact including standards map, component-to-standards table, required tests, documentation checklist, and certification decision tree.

missionDescription: Produce a v1 compliance/certification pathway artifact in /outputs: /outputs/compliance_standards_map.md plus a structured table mapping conversion components to applicable standards (FMVSS/UNECE where relevant), required tests (EMC, HV safety, braking, lighting, labeling), documentation package checklist, and an initial certification strategy decision tree.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
Compliance is a gating risk (goal_3) and currently exists only as discussion; a concrete standards-to-tests map is required for scalability and insurability.
